summary: Provides a compatibility layer for the Prefect framework, offering utilities to manage deprecated APIs and experimental features. Includes custom warning and exception types, message generation, decorators, and registration mechanisms that emit warnings, enforce opt‑in, and maintain backward compatibility while guiding users toward updated interfaces.
business_intent: Help developers transition away from outdated or unstable Prefect APIs safely, preserve existing workflows, and control the rollout of new or experimental functionality through configurable warnings and feature flags.
